Text: here is another socalled blueray film, but why does it say blue-ray when the files are mkv?

Because it's ripped from blueray - the x264-HD is the signifier.

Thanks for this torrent - Im having trouble with the episodes they crash VLC and other media players during playback at specific points - some episodes have several of these 'points'...any ideas?
GoodFilms, can you (or anyone for that matter) tell me why this torrent is 33GB for 13 episodes and your release of SoA season 2, also for 13 episodes, is 16.5GB? Is there a major quality difference?

Hi, can someone instruct me how to add subtitles? I use VLC 1.1.9 and choose subtitle track and then the correct file to the correct episode. In the menu of VLC it says track 1 is chosen, but no subtitle is visible. Is it something I have to do before I start the movie?
